ivardefs.name: alias_
ivardefs.desc: A list of alternate names that the location is known as, or was known as, in the past.

ivardefs.name: availabilityExceptions
ivardefs.desc: A description of when the locations opening ours are different to normal, e.g. public holiday availability. Succinctly describing all possible exceptions to normal site availability as detailed in the opening hours Times.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Description of the Location, which helps in finding or referencing the place.

ivardefs.name: endpoint_
ivardefs.desc: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location.

ivardefs.name: hoursOfOperation_
ivardefs.desc: What days/times during a week is this location usually open.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Unique code or number identifying the location to its users.

ivardefs.name: managingOrganization
ivardefs.desc: The organization responsible for the provisioning and upkeep of the location.

ivardefs.name: mode
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Name of the location as used by humans. Does not need to be unique.

ivardefs.name: operationalStatus
ivardefs.desc: The operational status covers operation values most relevant to beds (but can also apply to rooms/units/chairs/etc. such as an isolation unit/dialysis chair). This typically covers concepts such as contamination, housekeeping, and other activities like ma

ivardefs.name: partOf
ivardefs.desc: Another Location of which this Location is physically a part of.

ivardefs.name: physicalType
ivardefs.desc: Physical form of the location, e.g. building, room, vehicle, road.

ivardefs.name: position
ivardefs.desc: The absolute geographic location of the Location, expressed using the WGS84 datum (This is the same co-ordinate system used in KML).

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status property covers the general availability of the resource, not the current value which may be covered by the operationStatus, or by a schedule/slots if they are configured for the location.

ivardefs.name: telecom_
ivardefs.desc: The contact details of communication devices available at the location. This can include phone numbers, fax numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses and web sites.

ivardefs.name: type_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the type of function performed at the location.

properties.desc: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained, or accommodated.
